title: Scented Soy Wax Melts | Set of 12 Assorted 2.5oz Wax Cubes/Tarts | Home Fragrance for Candle Wax Warmer | Bulk Value
features: NATURAL SOY WAX MELTS – Made from all-natural soy wax, these hand poured wax tarts provide a clean burn and are easy to use. Wax melts are a safer alternative to traditional candles, so you can enjoy its fragrance without the worry of a flame.

ROOM FILLING FRAGRANCE – Designed with strong scents, these melting wax cubes will fill your room with a delightful aroma! Perfect for entryways, bedrooms, living rooms, bathrooms, offices, dens, and anywhere else you want to freshen the air.

LONG LASTING SCENTS – Each cube is designed to “burn” for 6-8 hours. Assorted scents include Jasmine,,strawberry, rosemary gardenia, peppermint， Blue bell， wood sage & sea salt peony cherry blossom ,English pear & freesia， Tulip, Japanese persimmon, Chanel coco.

EASY TO USE – Intended for use with electric wax melt burners, plug in wax warmers, and candle warmers. Simply add one cube to your wax warmer and enjoy the scent. These wax cubes make great gifts, Easter basket and stocking stuffers, holiday party supplies, and more!

VARIETY VALUE SET – This bulk value set includes an assortment of 12 different packs of wax melts. Each 2.5-ounce wax melt pack features 6 wax cubes that are easy to break apart for mix-and-match scents.
description: This bulk value pack includes 8 different 2.5-ounce packs of wax melts. Each wax melt features 6 cubes that each “burn” for 6-8 hours.
